Descriptions:
6 Derbyshire - The sky’s a canvas for life’s design

6 Derbyshire. A stunningly beautiful home designed to help you fulfill your aspirations in life. Your choice of 168 luxurious units, ranging from 1-, 2-, 3-bedroom units to an exclusive penthouse.

REFINEMENT IS THE ESSENCE OF LIFE

Success is never by mere chance. It is a result of favourable traits – virtue, integrity, resoluteness and honour. With this philosophy, Fantasia Holdings Group Co. Limited refines every residential development like a meticulous work of art to become a timeless masterpiece. Like the freehold 6 Derbyshire - a legacy for generations to come.

Feel the vibrancy everywhere

6 Derbyshire is intimately tucked away in the prestigious enclave of prime District 11. Near to the upcoming Novena medical hub, in between the two major shopping belts of Novena and Orchard, and environed by enrichment for children, it is a highly sought after home address and rare investment opportunity.

Cherish ever small dream

Give your children a promising avenue to dream and soar. Enrichment for children is varied and plenty around the neighbourhood, especially at United Square, a retail mall dedicated to the development of children. It is also a dream home for parents with school options, ranging from the ever-popular Anglo-Chinese Primary School to St. Joseph’s Institution Junior (St. Michael’s Campus), to Singapore Chinese Girls’ School and Anglo-Chinese School (Barker).

Make everyday a little brighter

A walking distance to Novena shopping hub, and a short drive to Orchard Road shopping and entertainment belt, there is simply no lack of choices. Give yourself something daily to look forward to, from regular shopping to occasional retail indulgences, or maybe a shopping adventure in quaint Little India.

Delight your taste buds every time

When it comes to dining, spoilt for choice is an understatement. Food havens, namely Novena, Balestier, Thomson, Newton and Orchard, are just a short drive away. Your daily menu ranges from old world charm hawker delights to international cuisines. Every experience is simply gastronomical.

Add a lush green to your experience

There is nothing more gratifying than lounging away amidst greenery, and even better, in the sky undisturbed by the hectic pace of the city. Enjoy the tranquility of two lush Sky Gardens on level 17 and level 27, where you can bask in the ambience or have some me-time.

Elevate your pleasure to the play deck

Take the enjoyment of condominium living to level 5, where you can indulge in a wealth of facilities, from a luxurious lap pool and gym to lounging corners, to an alfresco dining area and a function pavilion. Exercise away your daily stress or immerse yourself in the pleasures of the play deck.

Find your best dreams here

With spacious and functional layouts for 1-, 2-, 3-bedroom units and a penthouse, space has been fully utilised to make your moments at home enjoyable.

Perfect your home with quality

Each unit is generously furnished with exquisite and luxurious fittings, which are specially imported. Take pleasure in prestigious designer brands that decorate your home, from bedroom to kitchen.

Project Details

  • Project Name: Sims, An Urban Oasis
  • Developer: GuocoLand Limited
  • Address: Sims Drive, Singapore 380068
  • District: D14 Eunos / Geylang / Paya Lebar
  • Property Type: Condo
  • Tenure: 99 years leasehold
  • Total Units: 1024
  • Unit Mix: 1br,2br,3br,3br (Dual key), 4br, 4br (Dual Key) & 5br

Description

Sims, An Urban Oasis - Sims Drive is in fact a hidden gem tucked away at the edge of Singapore's bustling city. Here, you will find an Urban Oasis where one can enjoy the excitement and connectivity to the city, as well as the peace and tranquility of nature. With a slew of exciting developments taking place in its surrounding areas, Sims Drive is set to transform from a cluster of old cafes and factories into a modern town where heritage is hip and old-world charm meets edgy entrepreneurship.

Sims, An Urban Oasis- GuocoLand is proud to be part of Sims Drive’s transformation. We believe in fulfilling its potential value and endeavour to inject new life and success to the community.

  • An exciting development presenting an urban oasis combining both excitement and convenience at the city edge as well as the peace and tranquillity of nature
  • Located at the corner of Sims Drive and Aljunied Road, an established neighbourhood having a full range of amenities
  • 5 min walk to Aljunied MRT, one station away from the Paya Lebar MRT Interchange
  • Walking distance to the future Mattar MRT station on the Downtown Line
  • Easily accessible via the Pan Island Expressway (PIE), Kallang-Paya Lebar Expressway (KPE) & Nicoll Highway
  • 15 min drive to CBD and 18 min drive to Changi International Airport
  • Within the 1km vicinity of Geylang Methodist Primary and Secondary School
  • James Cook University will set up its new campus for 3,400 students at Sims Drive on February 2015, and they aim to expand enrolment to 7,500 in 3 to 5 years
  • Within a 10-min drive to several shopping and entertainment centres including the brand new Kallang Wave mall and upcoming Paya Lebar Square, as well as NEX, Singapore Expo and Suntec City
  • A food paradise with a confluence of food choices ranging from authentic local food stalls to famous restaurants
  • Strategically located in close proximity to growth clusters outlined by Singapore’s Government in the 2014 Master Plan such as the upcoming Paya Lebar sub-regional centre, Kallang Riverside and Wisma Geylang Serai, offering excellent investment opportunities
  • Relocation of the Paya Lebar airbase removes height restrictions and frees up land parcels to develop new and exciting plans and projects in the area in future

Project Details

  • Project Name: Principal Garden
  • Developer: UOL and Kheng Leong
  • Address: Prince Charles Crescent
  • District: D03 Alexandra / Commonwealth
  • Property Type: Condo
  • Tenure: 99 years leasehold
  • Total Units: 663
  • Unit Mix: 1br,2br,2br+DK,3br,3br+DK & 3/4br with Private Lift

Description

Principal Garden is a Premium Development by UOL and Kheng Leong located in the Prestigious Prince Charles Crescent. Principal Garden is dedicated to providing residents with a lush and vast Garden based on a 80/20 concept – 80 per cent Landscaped Gardens and 20 per cent for the Residential Blocks. Principal Garden has four times more nature than structure which makes it “A Dream Home” – A Premium Space Where Space is Truly a Premium!

Principal Garden is alongside a very beautiful park connector that has a waterway river that leads all the way to the Singapore River. Resident can take a pleasant stroll everyday! Singapore Top Shopping Paradise in Orchard, Foreigner Favourite Holland Village, High Technological Industries at One North, Heritage Chinatown and Busy Central Business District are merely 10 mins drive. These are some of the reasons why this area commands one of the highest rental yield for investors!

Gramercy Park is a freehold development located at 57 Grange Road, Singapore 249569, in District 10, minutes away from Orchard MRT Station. Gramercy Park is close to the Orchard Road shopping district and Singapore Botanic Gardens.

Amenities near Gramercy Park

Gramercy Park is just a 5 minutes’ drive to Singapore Central Business District (CBD). It is less than 1km from Orchard North South Line Station which is 4 stations away from Raffles Place in CBD. Future owners of Gramercy Park will enjoy the use of a nearer MRT station, come 2021, when Orchard Boulevard Train Station (along Thomson Line) goes into full operation.

River Valley Primary School, Zhangde Primary Schools, Crescent Girls’ School and Raffles Girls’ School are some local schools that are near Gramercy Park. International schools that are within walking distances are Overseas Family School, International School Singapore, Norwegian Supplementary School and Finnish Supplementary School.

Project Details

  • Project Name: Leedon Residence
  • Developer: Leedon Residence Development Pte Ltd
  • Address: Leedon Heights, Singapore 267938
  • District: D10 Tanglin / Holland
  • Property Type: Condo
  • Tenure: Freehold
  • Total Units: 381
  • Unit Mix: 2br, 3br, 4br, 5br & PH

Description

Leedon Residence is a Freehold Condominium located at 12, Leedon Heights, 267935. Situated on an expansive 4.9 hectare site next to the Leedon Park Good Class Bungalow enclave, Leedon Residence freehold residential developments - T.O.P soon in District D10. Leedon Residence is close to Farrer Road MRT station .

Amenities near Leedon Residence

Residents will benefit from the convenience of being in close proximity to popular commercial and lifestyle centres such as Holland Village, Dempsey Hill and Orchard Road . The nearby internationally renowned Singapore Botanic Garden provides a park area for residents.

Educational institutions in the vicinity include Nanyang Primary School, Raffles Girls’ Primary School, Hwa Chong Institution, National Junior College and Nanyang Girls’ High School.

Leedon Residence is designed by the award winning SCDA Architects Pte. Ltd., this project has also won the BCA Green Mark GoldPlus Award for its energy efficient features.

Project Details

  • Project Name: Parc Riviera
  • Developer: EL Development (West Coast) Pte Ltd
  • Address: West Coast Vale, Singapore
  • District: D05 Buona Vista / West Coast
  • Property Type: Condo
  • Tenure: 99 years leasehold wef 11 November 2015
  • Total Units: 752
  • Unit Mix: 1br, 2br, 3br & 4br

Description

Parc Riviera Developed by EL DEVELOPMENT and currently under construction, PARC RIVIERA is located in District 5 and has a total of 595 units.

This Condominium/Apartment is accessible through the nearest train stations such as Clementi (EW23), and Jurong East (EW24 NS1). The nearest primary schools are Nan Hua Primary School, Qifa Primary School, and Clementi Primary School.

This property is close to amenities like NTUC FAIRPRICE (TEBAN GARDEN), NTUC FAIRPRICE (WEST COAST), and NTUC FAIRPRICE (CLEMENTI MALL). The closest shopping malls are Imm, and Jurong Entertainment Centre.

Project Details

  • Project Name: Mon Jervois
  • Developer: Singland Development (Jervois) Pte. Ltd.
  • Address: 39 Jervois Road, Singapore
  • District: D10 Tanglin / Holland
  • Property Type: Condo
  • Tenure: 99 years wef 7th May 2012
  • Total Units: 109
  • Unit Mix: 1br, 2br, 3br, 4br & PH

Description

Mon Jervois is a 109-unit development located along Jervois Road near Prince Charles Crescent.
An Exclusive and Prestigious Locality

  • City living within a garden environment
  • Close proximity to the bustling Orchard Road, but tucked within a serene and quiet enclave with extensive greenery and water features dominating the landscape
  • Prime residential address in District 10 surrounded by Good Class Bungalows (GCB)

Excellent Accessibility

  • Less than 10 minutes’ drive to Orchard Road, CBD, Marina Bay Area and the Southern Waterfront area where Vivocity and Sentosa are located
  • Well-connected to major arterial roads such as Alexandra Road, Tanglin Road, River Valley Road and expressways such as CTE, AYE & ECP
  • Approximate 10 minutes walk to Redhill MRT

Premium Quality Fittings and Finishes

  • Functional layout furnished with premium fittings, finishes and appliances. (Miele, Hansgrohe, Laufen and high quality kitchen and wardrobe system)

High Capital Appreciation and Rental Yield

  • Close proximity to Raffles Place and Mapletree Business City
  • Close proximity to Science Parks, One-North, Fusionpolis and Biopolis
  • Close proximity to many international embassies

Fine Selection of Schools conveniently accessible

  • Within 1km from Crescent Girl’s School and Gan Eng Seng School
  • Within 2km from ISS International School (Elementary and Middle School Campus), Overseas Family School, Norwegian Supplementary School, Finnish Supplementary School

Voluminous and generous layout boasting high ceiling heights

  • Units come with either a furniture deck (for ground floor units & 2BR + Study Loft units) or a potential storage space (for typical units)
  • Unique loft unit apartments feature a double volume ceiling space with a mezzanine level (for 2BR + Study Loft units only)
